text: Allison Cara Tolman (born November 18, 1981)Date of birth per familysearch.org; accessed June 19, 2014. is an American actress. She played Molly Solverson in the first season of the FX television series Fargo. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Texas
